N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.101 - ONE LANE ROAD Sign (NYW3-15)

State Regulations

Standard: 01 The ONE LANE ROAD (NYW3-15) sign (see Sign Drawing
SD-W4) shall be used on two-lane, two-way highways to warn of locations where
alternate one-way operation in one lane is in effect. The ONE LANE ROAD sign
shall not be used where the ONE LANE BRIDGE (W5-3) sign (see Section 2C.21) is
applicable. Guidance: 02 The ONE LANE ROAD sign should be used on two-lane, two-way highways where roadway width reduces to less than 16 feet. 03 Where a Signal Ahead (W3-3) sign (see Section
2C.36
) and a ONE LANE ROAD sign
are needed for the same location, the ONE LANE ROAD sign should be placed in
advance of the Signal Ahead sign. Notes
